snippet: Mitt Romney urged thousands of conservatives to stand "shoulder to shoulder" with him as he works to oust President Obama.
abstract: Mitt Romney urged thousands of conservatives to stand "shoulder to shoulder" with him as he works to oust President Obama.
lead_paragraph: Mitt Romney faced thousands of conservative activists on Friday and urged them to stand "shoulder to shoulder" with him as he works to oust President Obama from office in November.

headline.main: Appealing to Activists, Romney Calls Himself 'Severely Conservative'
